sentences.en: 'Clumsy fellows,'said I;'they must still be drunk as owls.'
sentences.cn: “ 这些笨蛋, ” 我说, “ 他们大概还醉得像死猪一样. ”

sentences.en: a clumsy attempt to catch the ball
A clumsy waiter spilled wine all over her new skirt.
sentences.cn: 一名笨手笨脚的服务员把葡萄酒洒得她新裙子上到处都是。

sentences.en: He had lately begun to make clumsy yet endearing overtures of friendship.
sentences.cn: 最近他开始主动表示友好，样子笨拙却又招人喜爱。

sentences.en: He is clumsy with his hands.
He is still smarting over criticism of his victorious but clumsy performance.
sentences.cn: 他还在为别人批评他尽管最终胜出但表现笨拙感到闷闷不乐。
大家对他的拙劣发言均很反感.

sentences.en: His movements were clumsy, and his gait peculiarly awkward.
sentences.cn: 他动作笨拙，步态尤其难看。

sentences.en: I spilt your coffee. Sorry—that was clumsy of me.
sentences.cn: 我弄洒了你的咖啡。对不起，我真是笨手笨脚的。

sentences.en: It was a clumsy looking aeroplane.
Its body looks heavy and clumsy when it has eaten its fill.
sentences.cn: 它步态蹒跚,吃饱了的身体更显得笨拙可笑.

sentences.en: Jack is clumsy with his hands.
Mind that cup, you clumsy oaf!
sentences.cn: 当心那个杯子，你这笨手笨脚的家伙！

sentences.en: The keyboard is a large and clumsy instrument as far as portable computers are concerned.
sentences.cn: 就手提电脑而言，键盘就显得大而笨重了。

sentences.en: The lyrics are banal and the rhymes clumsy.
sentences.cn: 歌词平淡老套，押韵生硬蹩脚。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, I was still very clumsy behind the wheel of the jeep.
sentences.cn: 令人遗憾的是我开起吉普来还是笨手笨脚。

words.tran_cn: 笨拙的;愚笨的;不得体的

trans.tran_cn: 笨拙的，无技巧的，不得体的，粗糙的，难以移动的，设计欠佳的，难用的，难处理的，复杂难懂的，使用不便的
trans.tran_en: moving or doing things in a careless way, especially so that you drop things, knock into things etc
